case.title: African Female Wanted - 24 (Harlem / Morningside)
case.text: I am a Young Professional, mixed guy living alone in New York City looking for an African female from West or East Africa.I love African females, but I'm not sure where to find one so Craigslist here I go.I'm an attractive, tall, charming, funny and financially stable mixed white/blk guy, and I would love to hear from you. You will like me ;-)..I am easy to get along with and enjoy hanging out in New York City. If interested, send a photo and let me know a little about you?
